name: aqarat schema
title: aqarat
description: Comprehensive real estate schema: users, auth, developers, projects, buildings, units, media, reservations, transactions, inquiries, replies, notifications.

fields.name: listing_status
fields.comment: Allowed: active, reserved, sold, rented, expired

fields.name: price_period
fields.comment: e.g., monthly for rent, one_time for sale

fields.name: unit_id
fields.comment: Optional, derivable from listing_id; FK to units

fields.name: name
fields.comment: e.g., apartment, villa, studio, duplex, townhouse

fields.name: data_type
fields.comment: Expected value type: boolean, integer, decimal, string

fields.name: value
fields.comment: Feature value stored as string; interpret using data_type
